name: Rject
description: Rust project manager for the terminal to replace emacs's projectile. Made with Cursive-rs.

name: zig.nvim
description: Neovim plugin for zig. features include visualizing test output, running, and building.

name: Pylift
description: Python cli workout tracker, using click for arg parsing and matplotlib for graphics.

name: KissFm
description: Terminal file manager written with tui-rs. Made with my good friend Ethan Gumin.

name: Personal Website
description: Digital portfolio written in Vue with tailwindcss and DaisyUI, hosted on github.

name: TheCrypt
description: Mobile PGP encryption and key store application written with Flutter and Dart.
